post.body: I will make sure that Air Force One does not interfere with your important business. At least not for more than a couple of hours.
142 days & countin'. Laura says "start packin' and purgin' NOW." I said "Wait 'til after Christmas!", and she's all "Too many parties then!"
New Orleans! What's goin' on? How's the weather? Need anything? I'm on vacation until Tuesday, but leave a message, and I'll call you.
one hunnert and fourty-three days and counting. Is anybody still out there? Hello?
I mean, one 5 minute press conference and she thinks we're going out or something.
198 days and counting. My last G8 Summiting. Can I come home yet? Please? I think the German Chancellor is stalking me.
Happy Birthday to me. I'm "celebrating" it in Japan. Sushi on my birthday? Are you serious? Where's the meat?
In today's WRA, I plead for your tax donations to support the country that brings you so much great programming. http://is.gd/3ri
Please be welcome to sign up for my free, impersonal weekly update email. http://weeklyradioaddress.com/updatelist.htm
This week I talk about Romania, where I was for the NATO conference all week. Like you haven't read about it on the news. http://is.gd/3ri
Listen to my Weekly Radio Address, featuring our next presidential contender, John McCain! http://is.gd/3ri
One of the most decisive actions a government can take is to give people their money back so they can spend it. http://is.gd/2UP
Check out the book I wrote about me. I worked very hard on it, dictating for long hours. http://tinyurl.com/27aztd
Enjoy your ham, by the way. http://tinyurl.com/2ug9mw
This week on my Weekly Radio Address, I don't talk about Easter directly, but celebrating Christ by visiting a National Park. With a gun.
I think I'll do my Weekly Radio Address this week on the virtues of allowing guns in our national parks.
Here's the link: http://weeklyradioaddress.com/WRA20080308.htm
I'm very excited about this week's powerful Weekly Radio Address. I talk with our next president, Senator John McCain. We had hot dogs.
I'm very excited about this week's powerful Weekly Radio Address. I talk with our next president, Senator John McCain. We had hot dogs.
I did this week's radio address "for the kids," as they say. You can hear it at http://weeklyradioaddress.com.
